CustomField.description: This should be the ID of the Org Wide Email address that the From address of the Bank Rep Email should be set to. If left blank, it will default to the running user set when the email service was created.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This should be the ID of the Org Wide Email address that the From address of the Bank Rep Email should be set to. If left blank, it will default to the running user set when the email service was created.
CustomField.label: Org Wide Email
